    excerpt: "The current AI boom demands a lot of computing power. Right now, most of that comes from Nvidia’s GPUs, or graphics processing units—the company supplies somewhere around 90 percent of the AI chip market. In an announcement this week, it aims to extend its dominance with its newly announced next-generation GH200 Grace Hopper Superchip platform."
